title: In Step Out of Step III
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and C See Inscription
description: two sheets attached together in vertical format; top sheet has lightly spotted rust on white ground with linear organic shapes in rust; bottom sheet has swirled brick red, bright red, olive and tan ground with purple-grey linear loops (light) and thicker grey and white coils of various sizes
creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
